channel.title: Adding Dragon KiteShield problems
channel.description:
I tried adding Galkons New dragon kiteshield to my client and i cant seem to get it right. I opened up my class 8 and put this code next to all of my other items. [code]if(i == 8001) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option class8.anInt174 = 13701; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1560;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 344;//Model Rotation class8.anInt198 = 1104;//model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt204 = 0;//Unknown class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.anInt169 = -6;// model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = -14;//model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 13701;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 13701;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Kiteshield";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A rare, protective kiteshield".getBytes();//examin info }[/code] and i renamed the model 13701 and put it into my models folder, Then i compiled and ran my client. in game i pressed the add model button on my client. but when i wear the shield it goes into the weapon slot and looks like this: [img]http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/1544/26020492ac2.png[/img]
Any Ideas how i could fix this?

item.title: Adding Dragon KiteShield problems
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

gzip it make the model name 8831 and say in game

add model 8831

And compile and done.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Dragon KiteShield problems
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

ok, you need to go into

item.java

look for public int kiteshields[]

then at the end of that int add the item id number.

then go into

item.cfg and add the item in there

then you need to make sure you change the model id in class8 and models

not just one…

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Dragon KiteShield problems
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I think i gota g zip it
there was no original model number it was in rar format and it was titled dragon kite
and yes i have tried add model ####

How would i go about g zipping this model?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 04:27:26 pm[/size][hr]Omg i am such an idiot the file i downloaded had the g ziped models in it…

Read full topic

@i_duh_loot wrote:

Well what was orginal type of file downloaded
What was the orignall mod number

item.title: Adding Dragon KiteShield problems
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

If you want an item with an ID over 10,000, then you’ll have to make it a .dat. Hope I helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Dragon KiteShield problems
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

dont rename the model… once your in the server did you say add model 13701 and the other model (if there is one) before you picked the item up? And the code for the kite would be 8001 if you didnt notice. also if your wondering how to get it out of the weapons slot find a shield id that you think you’ll never use. for instance fremminek shield or something. get the id of that, go back into class 8 change that 8001 to the id of the shield you chose. should go right into the shields slot. Hope this helped.
-Da 0wnz

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Dragon KiteShield problems
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I tried adding Galkons New dragon kiteshield to my client and i cant seem to get it right.
I opened up my class 8 and put this code next to all of my other items.

if(i == 8001) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option class8.anInt174 = 13701; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1560;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 344;//Model Rotation class8.anInt198 = 1104;//model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt204 = 0;//Unknown class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.anInt169 = -6;// model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = -14;//model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 13701;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 13701;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Kiteshield";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A rare, protective kiteshield".getBytes();//examin info }
and i renamed the model 13701 and put it into my models folder, Then i compiled and ran my client. in game i pressed the add model button on my client. but when i wear the shield it goes into the weapon slot and looks like this:

Any Ideas how i could fix this?
